docs.text: one of the most respected names in american independent filmmaking is john sayles .
docs.label: negative

docs.text: he has built a strong reputation with films like matewan and the secret of roan inish , and one of his best was his last film , lone star .
docs.label: negative

docs.text: after sayles gave us this complex and unconventional look at ethnic tensions on the us-mexico border , expectation ran high for his next film .
docs.label: negative

docs.text: unfortunately , his men with guns is not the film anyone was hoping for .
docs.label: negative

docs.text: we are essentially told in the first reel where the film is going to go and what it is going to do .
docs.label: negative

docs.text: then the film does exactly what it promised , a painful as that is .
docs.label: negative

docs.text: the plot of men with guns can be summarized " in a central or south american country things are really bad for everybody in the mountains where the army clashes with the guerrillas .
docs.label: negative

docs.text: dr . fuentes did not believe how bad things were so he went .
docs.label: negative

docs.text: and he found out again and again and again . "
docs.label: negative

docs.text: of course it is perfectly true that in many places in that region armed conflicts have turned life into a living hell .
docs.label: negative

docs.text: a guerrilla war is always bad for civilians .
docs.label: negative

docs.text: but the film talks down to the viewer .
docs.label: negative

docs.text: dr . fuentes ( played by federico luppi ) teaches medicine in the capital city of his country .
docs.label: negative

docs.text: he has , as a great humanitarian gesture , trained and inspired some of his best students to go into the mountains and make the world a little better for the poor indios .
docs.label: negative

docs.text: fuentes believe the students to be up there doing humanitarian service .
docs.label: negative

docs.text: then he discovers one of his best students has instead returned to the city and runs a squalid private pharmacy .
docs.label: negative

docs.text: in shame and disappointment fuentes asks the student what has happened to the others .
docs.label: negative

docs.text: the student tells him the others are still in the mountains , but suggests that it may not be a good place to be .
docs.label: negative

docs.text: fuentes goes off to find and visit the doctors , ignoring the advice of his family and a patient who happens to be an army general .
docs.label: negative

docs.text: the results are little different than one would expect .
docs.label: negative

docs.text: dr . fuentes starts out incredibly naive .
docs.label: negative

docs.text: even some american tourists , present in the film mostly for comic relief , seem to know better than dr . fuentes that things have gotten pretty bad in the mountains .
docs.label: negative

docs.text: but fuentes has to go from one scene of barbarity to another and discover how wrong he was .
docs.label: negative

docs.text: sayles certainly could have used 126 minute of screen time to tell us something more profound than that nasty things are happening down there and most of the worst happens to the unarmed civilians .
docs.label: negative

docs.text: the cast is mostly unknowns to american audiences .
docs.label: negative

docs.text: federico luppi is the good mexican actor who played the antique dealer torn by mysterious forces in cronos .
docs.label: negative

docs.text: damian delgado makes a late appearance as an army deserter .
docs.label: negative

docs.text: mandy patinkin has a small role made to look bigger in the trailer .
docs.label: negative
